message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe holds significant value for you. While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it is worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time opportunity, as I have another interested buyer who is ready to pay $1000000. If you're interested in exploring this further, please let me know. I'm confident you won't regret it.
